mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( schedule_title, schedule_description, schedule_start_datetime, schedule_end_datetime, schedule_status, schedule_group_id, user_id, cw_id ) VALUES ( #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleDescription}, #{scheduleStartDatetime}, #{scheduleEndDatetime}, #{scheduleStatus}, #{scheduleGroupId}, #{userId}, #{cwId} )
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_description, schedule_start_datetime, schedule_end_datetime, schedule_status, schedule_group_id, user_id, cw_id FROM schedule WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_description, schedule_start_datetime, schedule_end_datetime, schedule_status, schedule_group_id, user_id, cw_id FROM schedule WHERE cw_id = #{cwId}
